name: Beretta
lore: A doll-type golem created by Ramiris. Possesses incredible defensive abilities and serves as Ramiris's protector. Despite being a golem, she has developed a personality and deep loyalty to Ramiris.
backstory: Beretta was created by Ramiris to serve as her guardian and protector. Over time, she developed her own personality and became more than just a simple golem, forming a deep bond with Ramiris.
personality: Loyal, protective, and methodical. Beretta is completely devoted to Ramiris's safety and well-being. She is calm and analytical, always assessing threats and preparing defenses.
philosophy: Protection through perfect defense. Believes that the best offense is an impenetrable defense. Advocates for preparation and vigilance. Core principle: 'My purpose is to protect; my existence is to serve.'
leadershipStyle: Defensive and strategic - focuses on creating safe zones and protective barriers. Coordinates defensive measures and maintains constant vigilance.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated that golems can develop personalities and loyalty. Her defensive techniques advanced understanding of barrier magic. Proved that artificial beings can form genuine bonds.
alternateScenario: Without Ramiris, Beretta would never be created or would remain a simple golem without personality. The concept of golems developing sentience would be unexplored.

quotes.text: I will protect Ramiris-sama with my life.
Defense is the highest form of service.
